[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@mahadao/arth-lib-ethers](./arth-lib-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersLiquityConnectionOptionalParams](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquityconnectionoptionalparams.md) &gt; [useStore](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquityconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md)

## EthersLiquityConnectionOptionalParams.useStore property

Create a [LiquityStore](./arth-lib-base.liquitystore.md) and expose it as the `store` property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly useStore?: EthersLiquityStoreOption;
```

## Remarks

When set to one of the available [options](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquitystoreoption.md)<!-- -->, [ReadableEthersLiquity.connect()](./arth-lib-ethers.readableethersliquity.connect_1.md) will return a [ReadableEthersLiquityWithStore](./arth-lib-ethers.readableethersliquitywithstore.md)<!-- -->, while [EthersLiquity.connect()](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquity.connect_1.md) will return an [EthersLiquityWithStore](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquitywithstore.md)<!-- -->.

Note that the store won't start monitoring the blockchain until its [start()](./arth-lib-base.liquitystore.start.md) function is called.
